Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Enacts the "New York Stock Act" prohibiting public officers and employees from using nonpublic information derived from their official positions for personal benefit
Summary: Enacts the "New York Stock Act"; prohibits public officers and employees from using nonpublic information derived from their official positions for personal benefit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting public officers and employees from using nonpublic information derived from their official positions for personal benefit
